data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CCACBoI5f1YQ7kNvgFUyJCw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkTU3pT_0rBXdPjVkcuu42q&oh=00_AYCo_Qt6yaEQ-4oosuDZl9KNT4LsoytvEAvG-5uRw3Y8eg&oe=66E82A8C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bVsIZsZBShQQ7kNvgFuk_h-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkTU3pT_0rBXdPjVkcuu42q&oh=00_AYBBl8sdF6dLNm7wpeuIM8Oiq94QFLMqvN0EOMziGF8DJw&oe=66E8289F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZCHNunD63kkQ7kNvgGC9f5x&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AkTU3pT_0rBXdPjVkcuu42q&oh=00_AYBQ1Un2nX2VIipg2Dsc7z7PP8VuGryY-AlTx67fI8mdVg&oe=66E80DF1)
